item.title: Better Forms
item.description: iSurvey Before you ask, this project has not been released in to the world, however I can provide you with demo iOS or Android app.

item.title: Flutter/Dart - Animations
item.description: Wallet in Flutter This is a fun little project built with Flutter and Firebase that showcases the versatility of these frameworks. Although not in production, this project could easily be transformed into a shopping app with beautiful animations and intuitive navigation.
